content.name: p
children: This listing page display all your orders with actions to view, edit and delete. You can click the reference number to view the house keepings details. As other tables, the info & pagination links are at the bottom of the page.

content.name: p
children: The house keeping view is compact. It displays logo and company details at top then date, id and reference with qrcode. Followed by from/to (for return sale/purchase) details and order items. Lastly tax summary and sale comment.

content.name: p
children: Add/edit order page uses the same form with following fields

children.name: li
children: Return Sale: accept return sale from customer

children.name: li
children: Return Purchase: send purchased products to supplier

children.name: li
children: Damage Stock: when you find the damaged stock

children.name: li
children: Expired Stock: when you stock is expired

children.name: li
children: Found Unknown: when found the extra product then current stock

children.name: li
children: : (optional) set or leave blank to auto generate

children.name: li
children: : select the customer/supplier (searchable) for return order only

children.name: li
children: : scan barcode or search to added products to the order. Set quantity to

children.name: li
children: : (optional) select multiple taxes for return order only

children.name: Fence
children:
Exclusive: Price * tax rate / 100
Price: 100, Net Price: 100, Tax Rate: 10 (10%), Unit Price: 110

children.name: Fence
children:
Inclusive: Price * tax rate / (100 + tax_rate)
Price: 100, Net Price: 90.91, Tax Rate: 9.09 (10%), Unit Price: 100

content.name: p
children: System will update the product's stock and set the customer dues accordingly.

children.name: p
children: If you have any suggestions, please

frontmatter.title: House Keepings
frontmatter.description: A house keeping is very useful as it can help you record return sales, return purchases, damage & expired stock or any stock found.
